title: GE GCST07N1WSS Microwave Oven, 700-watt 6 Auto Cooking Settings, Kitchen Essentials for The Countertop, Dorm Room or Apartment, Child-Lock Technology 0.7 Cu. Ft, Stainless Steel

Convenience cooking controls, defrost controls and Instant On one-touch controls make operation quick and easy. Stainless steel and clean lines bring understated sophistication to any kitchen d�cor.
